ViewModelName: Property name that will be generated.
CreationType: When the view is spawn, create an instance of the viewmodel.
GlobalViewModelIdentifier: Identifier of an already registered viewmodel.
ViewModelPropertyPath: The Path to get the viewmodel instance.
bCreateSetterFunction:
Generate a public setter for this viewmodel.
@note Always true when the Creation Type is Manual.
bCreateGetterFunction:
Generate a public getter for this viewmodel.
@note Always false when using a Instanced viewmodel.
bOptional:
Optional. Will not warn if the instance is not set or found.
@note Always true when the Creation Type is Manual.
bExposeInstanceInEditor: Expose the viewmodel instance on every instance of the user widget for modification in editor.
